en.inicioPresentation: I am a junior Full Stack Web Developer who utilizes cutting-edge programming tools to develop solutions for a variety of applications, including websites and mobile apps. My skills enable me to create visually appealing, easy-to-use, accessible, and innovative websites...
en.aboutDescription: I am a junior Full Stack Web Developer with experience studying at Oracle and Henry, where I gained knowledge in programming, web design, and programming logic. I have advanced skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, MySQL, and React; I have worked with various front-end frameworks and libraries. At Platzi, I developed a solid understanding of digital marketing, with a focus on SEO, social media advertising, email marketing, and content strategies. I use tools like Google Analytics to improve campaign performance. Additionally, my traditional education in Market and Sales Management at SENA equipped me with the skills to create successful marketing plans, analyze markets, understand consumer behavior, and manage advertising. With my diverse skill set and experience, I am a versatile Full Stack developer who can confidently tackle any challenge and collaborate effectively within a team.
en.aboutEducationTextOracle: During my time studying at Oracle, I had the opportunity to work on several interesting projects that allowed me to expand my knowledge in backend programming and programming logic improvement. I enhanced my skills in JavaScript, SQL, and learned to work with JAVA by creating various projects.
en.aboutEducationTextHenry: My experience at Henry allowed me to acquire valuable skills in creating attractive and functional web applications. During my time there, I developed programming projects that allowed me to improve my logic and skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, and React. I also learned how to work in a team and collaborate on projects with other developers.
en.aboutEducationTextPlatzi: During my time at Platzi, I acquired valuable skills in digital marketing, including SEO, social media advertising, email marketing, and content strategies. Additionally, I learned to use tools such as Google Analytics and META to measure and improve the performance of my campaigns. Thanks to this experience, I was able to develop valuable skills that have helped me better understand the interaction between marketing and web development.
en.aboutEducationTextSenaMarketing: During my time at SENA, I learned about marketing strategies, market analysis, consumer behavior, advertising, and sales management. The program allowed me to gain hands-on experience in creating and implementing marketing plans for real businesses. I also improved my communication and teamwork skills through group projects and presentations.
en.aboutEducationTitleSenaSales: Sales of products and services - SENA
en.aboutEducationTextSenaSales: During this period, I was a sales representative for a company that offered products and services to customers. I was responsible for identifying potential clients, presenting the products and services and closing deals. Through this experience, I developed strong communication and negotiation skills, as well as the ability to work under pressure and meet sales targets. I also gained a better understanding of the sales process and the importance of building long-term relationships with clients.
